description:
Gavin is a super cute gay guy that I had been trying to get in for quite some time.
He has a busy work schedule, which often has him traveling far and wide. It was hard to uh...nail him down!
Finally got him out and he is a very charming and intelligent guy. Very relaxed and has a smooth sexual attitude that I think the straight guys will enjoy.
Gonna put him with a couple guys and see what kind of chemistry we can create!
title: Gavin Walters - Solo
